title: [K-12] Analysis of Greek Kindergarten Writing Education Policies and Their Application to Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational linguistics and methods for analyzing educational policies
context.additional_context: Case study analyzing conflicts between functional and structural objectives in Greek writing education policies and their application to science communication education

learning_goals: The consistency between official documents of Greek kindergarten writing education policies and actual instructional design can be evaluated through document analysis.
Functional (communication-oriented) and structural (language structure-focused) writing goal frameworks can be comparatively analyzed.
An instructional design plan applying the functional approach of Greek policy can be developed for writing practical reports in science.

resources: Greek Kindergarten Writing Education Policy Document

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
